name: Medieval Cat Simulator
description:
Welcome to Medieval Cat Simulator! You are a trouble-making stray cat in a medieval village where you knock stuff over and wreak havoc!

This game is still being worked on, so it is pretty sparse as of right now. But have fun and let me know what you think.

Controls:

  • WASD or Arrow keys to walk
  • Use Mouse to look around
  • Hold Shift to sprint
  • Control and ESC to exit game

Make sure to unzip the file and unpack instead of running it to play the game.
